legacy.description: Africa Director at @gatesfoundation.
legacy.name: Paulin Basinga

legacy.full_text:
Excited to embark on my journey as Director of @GatesAfrica! 
Having been part of the @gatesfoundation for over 12 years, I'm committed to nurturing partnerships across the continent and achieving the #SDGs. Grateful for this incredible opportunity.

Congratulations @pbasinga on becoming Director of @GatesAfrica. The Gates Foundation is committed to tackling Africa's most pressing development challenges, and I know Paulin has the skills and experience to take this work to the next level.

legacy.description: Sharing things I'm learning through my foundation work and other interests.
legacy.name: Bill Gates

legacy.description: Former @UN Assistant Secretary-General; Deputy Executive Director @UN_Women & Amb of India; Presently commentator on #National & #International Affairs
legacy.name: Lakshmi M Puri

result.text:
It was a morning to cherish with @BillGates! 

His vision of using education as a tool for global development & his commitment to empowering women & girls in tech and sciences are making a lasting impact on humanity. 

I have had a long association with the Gates Foundation since my time at UN Women from 2011, when we collaborated on numerous initiatives including 'Making Women Count'

It was a pleasure to meet him again. We discussed India's role as a beacon for women-led development in the Global South.

Honoured to present my novel 'Swallowing The Sun' to him with an inscription that highlighted how the book was an ode to the universal human spirit and the right of everyone especially women and girls to realise their potential, their dreams - "Something you seek to do in the world"

@BMGFIndia @UN_Women 

#SwallowingTheSun

legacy.full_text:
It was a morning to cherish with @BillGates! 

His vision of using education as a tool for global development & his commitment to empowering women & girls in tech and sciences are making a lasting impact on humanity. 

I have had a long association with the Gates Foundation since… https://t.co/eIGF0YFrhZ

Thank you @lakshmiunwomen for your hospitality. Your commitment towards a gender-equal world is inspiring, and I thoroughly enjoyed our discussion on the positive impact of women-led development. Congratulations on your book #SwallowingTheSun.

legacy.description: Union Cabinet Minister for @MinistryWCD and @MOMAIndia | MP Amethi Lok Sabha Constituency
legacy.name: Smriti Z Irani (Modi Ka Parivar)

result.text:
Celebrating India's Nutrition Heritage with #PoshanUtsav via Cartoon Coalition! 🍲🥕🍎

In a momentous stride towards fostering a Suposhit Bharat, we, at the @MinistryWCD, proudly organised the Poshan Utsav, to amplify the importance of good nutrition through the first-ever Cartoon Coalition.

During the event, Mr. @BillGates and I launched the 'Poshan Utsav Book,' meticulously curated by the Deendayal Research Institute (DRI) and supported by the @BMGFIndia.

Building upon PM @narendramodi ji’s flagship initiative - POSHAN Abhiyaan, the cartoon coalition under the ‘Poshan se Padhai Tak’ Mission strives to revolutionise nutrition awareness by captivating children with storytelling through their favourite cartoon characters, like Chacha Chaudhary, Shambhu, and Suppandi to leverage the influence of cartoons to drive positive behaviour change for improved nutritional outcomes in our country.

The Poshan Utsav book serves as India’s first-ever Food Atlas, offering multifaceted insights from cultural, social, economic, and scientific perspectives. It underscores our Govt's resolve to revive ancient nutritional wisdom, encourage knowledge transfer, and ensure intergenerational learning.

With this, we embark on a journey of rediscovery and honouring India's culinary heritage and nutritional diversity, paving the way towards a stronger & healthier India! 🇮🇳

legacy.full_text:
Celebrating India's Nutrition Heritage with #PoshanUtsav via Cartoon Coalition! 🍲🥕🍎

In a momentous stride towards fostering a Suposhit Bharat, we, at the @MinistryWCD, proudly organised the Poshan Utsav, to amplify the importance of good nutrition through the first-ever… https://t.co/bi9Qevsm3F

It was inspiring to learn about India's holistic approach to children's nutrition and wellbeing, @smritiirani. Initiatives like POSHAN 2.0 and Poshan Utsav Book are paving the way for informed decisions about nutrition.

result.text: Thank you, @HardeepSPuri, for hosting us today and for hosting an insightful discussion with @Rajeev_GoI and some of India’s great minds. The country’s growth story exemplifies the power of collective effort in driving impactful change. Strengthening cross-sectoral collaborations can solve the toughest challenges around the world. @MoHUA_India

user_mentions.name: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

legacy.description: India's Union Minister for Housing & Urban Affairs & Minister for Petroleum and Natural Gas. Former diplomat & author.
legacy.name: Hardeep Singh Puri (मोदी का परिवार)

result.text:
Delighted to host a working breakfast for @BillGates, co-chair of @BMGFIndia along with several eminent members of his team, my colleague Sh @Rajeev_GoI Ji, captains of Indian industry, entrepreneurs & founders of popular Indian Unicorns & others at my residence today.
Held wide ranging discussions on our ongoing partnerships & areas of further cooperation.

Mr Gates is a great partner of  India with immense dedication towards solving human challenges.

India is on the move & this was a morning of celebrating the many stories which have together created the India Growth Story & continue to propel India towards a glorious future. 

From @zomato which delivers 1.3 m orders from 150k restaurants across India per day, to India’s energy Navratna @ONGC_, from @Naukri which clocks an average of about 1 million searches everyday through the Naukri database by recruiters, to @policybazaar which offers transparency to insurance consumers using digital technology since 2008. 

@PMOIndia 
@singharunongc @TimesNow @deepigoyal @sbikh @navikakumar @MoHUA_India @PetroleumMin @MoHFW_INDIA @PIB_India @MIB_India

user_mentions.name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas #MoPNG

result.text: It was great to see digital health innovations like the Arogya Maitri Disaster Management Cube-BHISHM and discuss our shared commitment to leverage Indian research and technology to eliminate TB, sickle cell, and maternal anemia with @mansukhmandviya. Looking forward to continued partnership between @BMGFIndia and @MoHFW_INDIA.

legacy.description: #GreenMP | Minister of Health and Family Welfare; Chemicals and Fertilizers, GoI l Doctorate in Political Science | @OfficeOf_MM |
legacy.name: Dr Mansukh Mandaviya (मोदी का परिवार)

legacy.full_text:
Wonderful meeting with @BillGates yesterday.

We discussed a wide range of subjects related to healthcare including the promotion of digital health, affordable diagnostics, etc.

He also observed & appreciated India's BHISHM Cube initiative, an indigenous mobile hospital. https://t.co/bNDpx4Yt8Y

It was great to see digital health innovations like the Arogya Maitri Disaster Management Cube-BHISHM and discuss our shared commitment to leverage Indian research and technology to eliminate TB, sickle cell, and maternal anemia with @mansukhmandviya. Looking forward to continued…

additional_media_info.title: In Chula Vista, math is more than just numbers
additional_media_info.description: In today's economy, math is more crucial than ever—but the way it's taught hasn't always kept pace with the real world. Chula Vista Middle School is pioneering a fresh approach.

additional_media_info.title: In Chula Vista, math is more than just numbers
additional_media_info.description: In today's economy, math is more crucial than ever—but the way it's taught hasn't always kept pace with the real world. Chula Vista Middle School is pioneering a fresh approach.

legacy.full_text: U.S. students flunk algebra more than any other course—but one middle school in Southern California is working to change that with a new approach to teaching math that involves McDonald’s and movie theater popcorn. https://t.co/icvz2G1bQE

value.string_value: Bill Gates writes about the day he spent in an 8th grade math class in Chula Vista, where popcorn is used to teach students math with real-world applications.
What does popcorn have to do with math?

legacy.description: Sharing things I'm learning through my foundation work and other interests.
legacy.name: Bill Gates

legacy.full_text: I joined a math class at Chula Vista Middle School, where real-world problems—like how to get the most bang for your buck when buying movie theater popcorn—are changing the way students learn America’s least favorite subject. https://t.co/zDyEOZm257
